events.title: "One River, Many Visions" Exhibit at the Seven Stars Gallery
events.venue_name: Nevada City Odd Fellows Seven Stars Gallery
events.description: Nine local artists celebrate our “back yard” part of the great atmospheric and oceanic river that flows around the globe. Exhibiting artists are: Gail Lipson, Denise Wey, Jeff Bousfield, Beth Leydon, Chic Lotz, Steve Curl, Miriam Morris, Risa Roseman, Juliette Williams, Inge Ivens, and Leah Ellis The artists reception is from 5:00 – 7:00 pm on Friday, February 13th. Regular gallery hours are: Thursdays – Sundays, from 11:00 am to 5:00 pm For questions or to contact the gallery, please click here
events.venue_address: Nevada City Odd Fellows Seven Stars Gallery, 210 Spring St., Nevada City, 95959

events.title: Nevada County Cannabis Alliance Webinar: Using Local Policy to Scale Your Cannabis Business
events.description: Over the past decade, The Nevada County Cannabis Alliance has advanced fair and equitable policies that support our local licensed cannabis industry. In this webinar, Executive Director of the Cannabis Alliance, Diana Gamzon, will teach you how to utilize these policies to strengthen, expand, and protect your business in a competitive market. Discover the key local policy wins and how to turn them into real opportunities for your farm or brand. Please join us online for the free webinar: “Using
events.venue_address: Bodhi Hive, 420 Providence Mine Road, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Acoustic Jam and Open Mic Night at the Wild Eye
events.description: After a few songwriter requests, we’re planning on having this acoustic jam and open mic night more often, at least a couple of Thursdays per month. We’ll have various hosts; this week, local songwriter Robby Robinson will be the host. This open mic welcomes songwriters, acoustic jammers, and players from music’s softer side. The pub has a PA, lights, and some instruments, or bring yours. Come by and play, or just listen. Doors open at 5:00 pm. No cover – but donations are welcome. _____________
events.venue_address: Wild Eye Pub, 535 Mill Street, Grass Valley, CA, 95945, United States

events.title: Open Jam Night at Gold Vibe Kombuchary
events.description: Calling all musicians, singers, and music lovers! Join us every first and third Thursday from 6:00 – 8:30 pm for Open Jam Night at Gold Vibe Kombuchary in Grass Valley, where creativity, collaboration, and live music come to life! Whether you’re an experienced performer, a budding artist, or just love live music, this is your chance to take the stage, connect with fellow musicians, and enjoy a night of incredible talent. What to Expect: – All musicians and genres welcome: solo acts, bands, and s
events.venue_address: Gold Vibe Kombuchary, 12615 Charles Drive, Grass Valley, CA, 95949, United States

events.title: The Doo Wop Project at the Center for the Arts
events.description: The Doo Wop Project brings the classic sounds of vocal harmony into the 21st century. Featuring stars from Broadway hits like Jersey Boys, Motown, and Beautiful, this supergroup takes audiences on a journey from the golden age of street-corner harmonies to modern hits “Doo Wop-ified” with their signature style. With a PBS special, four albums, and sold-out shows worldwide, the Doo Wop Project delights every generation with music that’s timeless and fresh. 7:00 – 9:00 pm on Thursday, February 19t
events.venue_address: The Center for the Arts, 314 W. Main Street, Grass Valley, CA, 95945, United States

events.title: NU Dance: 25th Annual Student Choreography Showcase
events.venue_name: Nevada Union High School – Don Baggett Theatre
events.description: Nevada Union High School’s Theatrical Dance program proudly presents the 25th annual Student Choreography Showcase on Thursday, February 19th through Saturday, February 21st from 7:00 – 9:00 p.m. at the Don Baggett Theater, 11761 Ridge Road in Grass Valley. Twenty student choreographers have created dances in a variety of styles, taught to their peers in after-school and weekend rehearsals. Junior Tabby Gillespie is choreographing for the first time this year, and she chose “Benny and the Jets”
events.venue_address: Nevada Union High School – Don Baggett Theatre, 11761 Ridge Road, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Sans Backup Plan Records Live Music Event: Living Hour, Rosemother, and Davia
events.description: Please join us for an evening of live music featuring: Living Hour, an indie rock band touring from Canada; Rosemother, a Sacramento-based dream pop band; as well as local Nevada City artist, Davia, from 7:00 to 10:00 pm on Thursday, February 19th at Sans Backup Plan Records, 748 Zion Street, Suite A in Nevada City. It’s an all-ages event on a sliding scale admission basis!
events.venue_address: Sans Backup Plan Records, 748 Zion Street, #A, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Gardens of Huemanity at Axis Gallery
events.description: Gardens of Huemanity by Delgreta Brown is an exploration of multiple environments — terrestrial, aquatic, celestial, and aerial. In a time where communities are challenged by the notion of belonging to society or lands, Delgreta Brown asserts that these vibrant, beautiful environments are enriched by an array of hues and inhabited by the African diaspora’s presence. Gardens of Huemanity is a visual and sensory effort to activate resilience. Delgreta depicts the African diaspora in these natural
events.venue_address: Axis Gallery, 625 S Street, Sacramento, CA, 95811, United States

events.title: Porcelain Ashtray at Axis Gallery
events.description: Friday, February 6th through Sunday, March 1st with regular gallery hours from noon t0 5:00 pm, Friday – Sunday. Second Saturday Reception from 5:00 – 8:00 pm on February 14th. Axis Gallery is pleased to present Porcelain Ashtray, an exhibition of new works by Sacramento-based artist Adam Cochran. Family slides taken in the 1950s, 60’s, and 70’s have been reworked and re-imagined as oil paintings, creating intimate moments of reflection and connection. events.title: Live in the Parsonage Annex: Meka and Emilie Rose
events.description: Please join us for an intimate evening of music at the Parsonage Annex in downtown Nevada City with songstress Meka Lingo from 7:00 – 8:30 pm on Friday, February 20th. This cozy winter evening will be hosted by the lovely Emilie Rose, surrounded by friends and community. The event has a door cover, and bring your favorite spirit/beverage to savor or share. Limited seating will be available. Meka is a self-taught multi-instrumentalist and songwriter based in Nevada City. She enjoys waxing and wan
events.venue_address: The Parsonage Annex, 425 Broad Street, Nevada City, 95959, United States

events.title: Albert Cummings: Blues Guitar Pyrotechnics at Sutter Creek Theatre
events.description: 8:00 – 10:00 pm on Friday, February 20th (with doors opening at 7:30). Open seating, with beer and wine available for purchase. Albert Cummings is a distinguished American blues guitarist, singer, and songwriter whose commanding guitar work and soulful voice have made him a standout figure in the contemporary blues scene. Born and raised in Massachusetts, Cummings developed a passion for blues music at an early age, drawing inspiration from legends like: Stevie Ray Vaughan, B.B. King, and Jimi H
events.venue_address: Sutter Creek Theatre, 44 Main Street, Sutter Creek, CA, 95685, United States

events.title: Full Cup Band at Elixart
events.description: Full Cup is gracing the Elixart stage with their unique blend of jam band/folk/reggae styles from 8:00 pm to midnight on Saturday, February 21st. Hailing from Chico, this will be their first time playing Elixart, but aficionados of their music claim it will be a tight fit sure to be a special night!
events.venue_address: Elixart, 203 York St., Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Karaoke Fridays at the Dew Drop Inn
events.description: The karaoke fun starts at 8:30 pm, and lasts until you’re done singing (or at 11:30 pm)! Every Friday at the Dew Drop Inn – come show us what you got!
events.venue_address: The Dew Drop Inn, 19729 Cerrito Rd, Grass Valley, CA, 95949, United States

events.title: Arkaingelle with the Purity Attack Band at the Crazy Horse
events.description: Arkaingelle is a visionary reggae artist and spiritual lyricist, hailing from Guyana, South America. His music reflects his deep connection to the divine, and his mission to spread love, unity, and consciousness. His soulful voice and poignant lyrics weave together a rich tapestry of roots reggae, dancehall, and conscious vibes, transporting listeners to a higher plane of existence. With a career spanning over two decades, Arkaingelle has collaborated with top producers and artists, and has perf
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Fruit Tree Pruning and Organic Orchard Management Seminar
events.description: Join Daniel Nicholson in a lively discussion about orchard site selection, care, pests, planting and pruning.

events.title: "Work Your Workshop" at the Sierra Center for Spiritual Living
events.description: Work Your Workshop is a five-hour, hands-on experience, facilitated by Rev. Mitch Austin, Spiritual Director, that is designed to help you turn your ideas, lived wisdom, and unique perspective into a clear, meaningful workshop that truly serves others. This experience is ideal for anyone who feels called to share what they’ve learned in a way that helps others. Through guided exercises and step-by-step structure, you’ll clarify your message, identify your audience, shape your content, and create
events.venue_address: Sierra Center for Spiritual Living, 119 Florence Ave., Grass Valley, CA, 95945, United States

events.title: UC Master Gardeners of Nevada County Free Workshop: Roses
events.description: Please join the UC Master Gardeners of Nevada County for a free workshop: Roses, from 10:00 – noon on Saturday, February 21st at the Madelyn Helling Library in Nevada City! There are so many question regarding roses, the types such as: hybrid tea, floribunda, rambling? As well as: what does it all mean? What are those black spots? When do I feed them? How do I prune them? Come to the Madelyn Helling Library on February 21st and all will be revealed! You can always check our website for the lates
events.venue_address: Madelyn Helling Library, 980 Helling Way, Nevada City, CA, 95959, United States

events.title: Nifty Adoption Day
events.description: This month we’ll feature puppies as there are no kittens available at this time. Cat and kitten adoptions from 11:00 am to 2:00 pm on the third Saturday of every month at Sammie’s Nifty Thrift Shop in Grass Valley.
events.venue_address: Sammie’s Nifty Thrift Shop, 535 E. Main Street, Grass Valley, CA, 95945, United States

events.title: Sound Blessings with Robin at Inner Path
events.description: While you relax on your back with your eyes closed, a magical sound experience, infused with your personal blessings, will be created from crystal singing bowls, voice and other instruments. The invitation is to simply relax and float on the healing vibrations. Admission is by suggested donation.

events.description: Dance to lively, fiddle-driven tunes from the New England, Appalachian, and Celtic traditions! Come early (6:40 pm) for a lesson. events.title: "I Love On the Spot": On the Spot Improv Show
events.description: Picture the chaos, the comedy, the “Lucy, you’ve got some ‘splainin’ to do!” energy — now make it live improv. Please join us for I Love On the Spot, a family-friendly comedy improvisation show that’s full of surprises, big laughs, and audience-inspired fun! From 7:00 – 8:30 pm on Friday, February 21st at the TNT Studio in Roseville. No scripts. No reruns. Just pure, on-the-spot hilarity that you’ll love, and will bring the whole family to laugh together! Don’t miss it — because comedy this good
